venue.address_1: 650 Portland Avenue Corner of Rt 4/Roberts Rd
venue.name: Garrison Players Arts Center

item.description:
Hi theater lovers join us as we check out a new play at the Garrison Theater.

Ex-GI Willum is very excited to finally meet the man who saved his life in the war, but when his hero shows up, he proves to be a bumbling, tactless “nerd”, whose overstayed welcome leads to one uproarious incident after another

Please arrive by 8 pm

TICKET PRICES

Adults: $18

http://www.garrisonplayers.org/index.php

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: The Nerd
